title: Interpretation of adultery in a dream by Ibn Shaheen

preview.html: In this article, we will examine for you the interpretation of adultery in a dream and its meaning in detail in different cases. Practicing prostitution in reality is one of the greatest sins that God has forbidden to His servants, as he said in his message. The venerable book in Surat Al-Isra, verse 32 (And do not approach adultery, for it is obscene and reprehensible). On the other hand, this vision represents one of the most disturbing and ugly visions that can negatively affect their mood, indicating a major problem for the dreamer, but dream interpreters such as Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen worked hard to explain this dream, which we will learn in the encyclopedia.Prostitution in a dreamInterpretation of a dream Adultery by Ibn SirinIbn Sirin explained that seeing adultery in a dream indicates that the dreamer has committed a crime in reality and that in the case of indecency with an unknown woman in the dream this indicates that he gets what he wants, and that the vision indicates that the dreamer has committed a crime. Acquiring money, and God knows best. In the case of incest between a father and his daughter, this vision indicates that there are problems between them in reality. If the dreamer sees himself committing adultery with the wife of someone he knows, then this vision indicates the dreamer’s desire to benefit from this person. As for committing adultery with A well-known man, so this vision indicates that the dreamer participates with this person in committing sins. Seeing adultery with an unmarried girl in a dream indicates his marriage to a girl with good morals. Ibn Shaheen’s interpretation of a dream about adultery. Ibn Shaheen presented different interpretations of the vision of incest. In the case of women who practice incest Relatives: This vision shows severing a relationship with one of his relatives as a result of causing trouble, and God knows best. In the case of adultery with the father, this vision indicates that there is a big problem in reality between the dreamer and his father, to the point of rivalry. If the dreamer sees that he is committing adultery with his son, then this vision is not It is good and indicates that his son has committed a lot of bad behavior in reality. But if he sees in a dream practicing prostitution with a woman he does not know, this vision indicates that he will lose money if this woman menstruates. In the case of indecency with a dead person, this vision indicates It exposes him to many problems in reality. If he rejects adultery in a dream, then this vision is good news for the dreamer about the arrival of comfort and the removal of worries. Interpretation of seeing adultery in a dream for a single woman. As for the meaning of this dream for a single woman, this vision has many interpretations, including that it is an indication of her desire In marriage. This vision also shows that some of those around her have actually deceived her. Ibn Sirin also interpreted this vision as a warning message to the dreamer of the necessity of repenting to God and staying away from the sins and disobedience he committed. Prostitution in a dream for a married woman This vision has many interpretations for a married woman The most important of which is that it shows that she is deceiving those around her, and that the vision indicates that she is suffering from worries and problems in reality. In the case of adultery with a known man in a dream, this vision indicates benefit from those behind this man, but if the man is unknown, then this vision is a sign of her happiness with her husband.

title: Interpretation of seeing a river in a dream for a single girl married to a pregnant woman

preview.html: The meaning of a river in a dream, whether it is fresh or salt water. Interpretation of a dream about a river by Ibn Sirin: To see a river in a dream is a noble person, and whoever enters it mixes with a man of the greatest people. If the water is clean, then drinking from the river indicates a peaceful life full of goodness. If the river water is cloudy, this indicates In a life that contains matters and tragedies, God forbid. Seeing a bathroom or bathing in river water portends the departure of worries, problems, and fear. If you dream of seeing a clean river, you will soon be able to enjoy happy moments and your business will flourish. But if the river water is turbid and muddy, you will live a life full of intense competition with... Who is competing with you. If you are surrounded by water due to the flow of river water, this portends temporary pressures in the work environment or that you will suffer from anxiety about your personal news reaching people’s ears, which will harm your reputation. If you dream that you are swimming in a clear river and you see corpses at the bottom of the river, This foretells that problems will soon follow the joys and pleasures of the day. If you see a dry river in your dream, this portends illness and misfortune. Seeing the river in one’s dream. An unmarried or unmarried woman dreams that she drinks from the river water, this foretells her safety and security, and bathing in it or washing from it means purity and chastity. And swimming. In the river, it heralds the approaching marriage and engagement, and the overcoming of dangers and troubles. Seeing the river in a married woman’s dream, and for a married woman who sees the river in her dream, it is a sign of security in sustenance, and the river is a symbol of a loyal husband, and the river’s water symbolizes livelihood, and swimming or bathing in the water of the river portends pregnancy in that year. Seeing a river in a pregnant woman’s dream. As for a pregnant woman who sees a river in her dream, this bodes well that her conditions are going well and portends a natural birth. Seeing in a dream that you are swimming in the river. Swimming in a clear river means obedience and faith, and swimming in the river in a man’s dream symbolizes goodness. The upcoming livelihood, or it may indicate good deeds, and swimming against the current means confrontation or competition in work or love, while drowning in the river. Water indicates failure. Seeing yourself crossing the river in a dream. Seeing yourself crossing the river from one bank to another indicates traveling from one country to another, and crossing the Tigris or Euphrates river foretells success at work, a lot of money or marrying an Iraqi girl, and crossing the Jordan River may symbolize To her journey and marrying into her family. Seeing the Nile River in a dream As for the Nile River, seeing it heralds goodness and abundance of sustenance in various areas related to life, and drinking from the Nile water for non-Egyptians may mean traveling to Egypt in search of knowledge, living, and swimming in the Nile waters. Staying in Egypt or Sudan, and crossing the Nile River symbolizes the journey out of Egypt. Seeing a dry river in a dream Seeing a dry river in a dream symbolizes an immoral or poor man, and seeing a dry river in an unmarried girl or woman’s dream symbolizes a son-in-law. Useless, barren, or barren. . A dry river may indicate a moose

title: Interpretation of seeing a paralyzed dead person in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a paralyzed dead person in a dream. Some people want to know the interpretation of seeing a paralyzed dead person in a dream, and it is one of the most disturbing dreams. In addition, the site and its operators have no relation to interpretations. Interpretation of seeing a paralyzed dead person in a dream. If one sees a paralyzed dead person in a dream, it can This is a warning sign for the dreamer about the bad deeds he commits. It is possible that seeing a paralyzed father in a dream indicates his son’s misbehavior and he stops him and repents to God the Most High and Blessed. A dead person being paralyzed in a dream could indicate that the dreamer has been afflicted with some health problems and obstacles that the dreamer may face. In his life during this time, and God knows best. Whoever dreams of the paralysis of a deceased person may indicate the stress and tension that the dreamer is dealing with in those days, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing dead people again in a dream: In the event that you see a dead person dying again in a dream, this may indicate changes Bad things happen to the dreamer, and God knows best. Dreaming of a dead person dying again, and there were shouts and screams that could indicate a problem that a family member fell into during this time, and God knows best. If we see the death of a dead person in a dream, this may indicate a health problem that the dreamer may face. Or a member of his family during those days, and God knows best. In the event that a person mourns the death of the deceased again in a dream, this may indicate a crisis that the dreamer was facing in those days, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing a dead person having his clothes torn in a dream. In the event that he sees the deceased, his clothes Torn in a dream, this may indicate that the dreamer will be exposed to a financial crisis for some time. In the event that a person sees that the deceased has torn clothes, this may indicate the suffering that the dreamer suffered a lot in those days. A dream may indicate a dead person whose clothes are torn In a dream, it indicates bad events that the dreamer may face in his life during those days. Whoever sees in his dream that the dead person has torn his clothes, this indicates the severing of ties of kinship in those days, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing a dead person watering crops in a dream. The place of a dream about a deceased person watering plants and his appearance. Beautiful, it could indicate that the dreamer has reached his goals and aspirations in those days. Anyone who sees in a dream that the deceased was watering the plants may indicate good events that will come to the dreamer during this period, and God knows best. Whoever sees in a dream that the deceased was watering the plants It may indicate the high position that the dreamer will reach in those days by the grace of God. And dreaming of a dead person watering plants in a dream may indicate the good things that the deceased left for his family and that he helped them a lot at that time, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing the dead in wet clothes in a dream. Seeing the dead in wet clothes In a dream, it may indicate the dead person’s need for prayer and zakat at that time, and God knows best. Whoever sees in a dream that the deceased’s clothes are wet with water could indicate bad events that may happen to the dreamer in his life, and God knows best. It is possible that seeing the dead person’s wet clothes in a dream indicates... The dreamer will suffer great difficulties and crises in his life during this period

title: Interpretation of a dream about a man breastfeeding an unmarried girl in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a man breastfeeding an unmarried girl in a dream. Interpreters give many interpretations, some of which are good and others are opposite. Therefore, we learn about the interpretation of a dream about a man who is breastfeeding. From the breast of an unmarried girl in a dream.. Interpretation of a dream of a man breastfeeding an unmarried girl in a dream. Interpretation of dreams of a man breastfeeding an unmarried girl in a dream. Seeing an unmarried girl breastfeeding a man could represent marriage, and God knows best. Whereas if an unmarried girl sees a man breastfeeding, it may indicate That is on marriage, God willing. Seeing a man breastfeeding can be evidence of the beginning of a new stage of chastity, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about feeding a cow in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about feeding a cow in a dream. We did not find clear meanings to see this, except that seeing a cow milking and emitting milk could be an indication of pregnancy and breastfeeding, with permission. God. When a married woman sees a cow being milked and milk comes out of it, this may indicate pregnancy, and God knows the unseen. Seeing a cow can also express a high status, and God knows the unseen. Seeing a husband breastfeeding his wife may lead to problems that require his wife’s help, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of dreams of my ex-husband breastfeeding me in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of my ex-husband breastfeeding me in a dream could be a sign of his victory over you, and God knows the unseen, where a divorced woman can see her husband. When a divorced woman sees her ex-husband breastfeeding from her, this may indicate what he takes from her as well as breastfeeding, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. If a divorced woman sees her breastfeeding her child after weaning in a dream, it may be This is evidence of wrong actions, and God knows best. It can also express illness, and God knows the unseen. title: The 7 most famous interpretations of seeing a boat in a dream

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing a boat? It means escaping from the temptations of ignorance and common superstitions. What is the meaning of seeing a boat while walking on the sea and rowing? This means that the end of what you are searching for now is destined for success. What is the interpretation of seeing a deceased person you know on a ship? It means that he is in a position Generous in the afterlife. What does it mean to see that you are in a boat with dead people in reality? It means the debt that you will have to pay. It is the interpretation of the vision of the boat for a married woman? This means a lot of good. The interpretation of the vision of the boatThe boat to Nabulsi means deliverance from temptation and destruction. If you are planning to travel about By sea, a boat will mean peace from drowning. A dream of a boat means escaping from the temptations of ignorance and superstition common in your country or village. A married man dreams of a boat, denotes a good wife who protects and protects her husband in your absence. If the boat floats in the middle of the sea without moving, It means stranding or loss, and lack of money. The sinner’s ship means repentance and return to Almighty God. For the person concerned, the boat means relief, and for the poor, wealth because it is the primary source of livelihood for fishermen. Interpretation of a dream about rowing a boat. Interpretation of seeing a boat while you are walking with it in the sea and rowing, and this means that the end of what You are currently searching for success, because you are seeking to establish your company or attend training courses to find a job, this means success in your profession or finding the appropriate job. And if you are sick and recovering from the disease, provided that you work diligently in doing so, i.e. examining and diagnosing the disease with doctors and taking the necessary medications. Because a dream about rowing means Effort on your part, and the boat means the success of your mission that you sought. I see that I am in a boat. If it actually leads to the boat with the dead, this means a debt that you will spend or a temptation that you will escape from. The interpretation of seeing a boat means that a door to livelihood will open before you after a life of distress, distress, and anguish. If If you are single and your boat is sailing smoothly in the sea, you will get married soon. If you see a dead person on the ship, it means that he is in a decent position later. Seeing a dream with a boat for singles. Interpretation of seeing a boat in a dream for a single woman is a sign of her strong determination to manage life. If the ship goes With him to the sea and not knowing where to anchor, this means the stage of loss he is living in, but he will soon survive. If the sea is calm, then the ship here is a symbol of a strong, strict, but loving and generous man’s husband. It is said that the boat is a traveler, and riding in general means a lot of good. Interpretation of a dream The boat for a pregnant woman: The dream of a union is therapeutic for a pregnant woman. The interpretation of seeing a boat for a married woman means a lot of good, and she will be relieved of problems and disputes for a long time. The union means that her fetus comes with many good things for her. The astronomy is safety and closeness to God Almighty, because our master Noah was safe In his orbit, and God knows best. Joy in a dream. Seeing grilled fish. Shrimp in a dream. Lentils in a dream. Seeing raw fish. Suicide in a dream. Vomiting in a dream. Feces in a dream. A date in a dream. The snake in a dream. A person you love several

Seeing a dream with a boat for singles. Interpretation of seeing a boat in a dream for a single woman is a sign of her strong determination to manage life. If the ship goes With him to the sea and not knowing where to anchor, this means the stage of loss he is living in, but he will soon survive. If the sea is calm, then the ship here is a symbol of a strong, strict, but loving and generous man’s husband. It is said that the boat is a traveler, and riding in general means a lot of good. Interpretation of a dream The boat for a pregnant woman: The dream of a union is therapeutic for a pregnant woman. The interpretation of seeing a boat for a married woman means a lot of good, and she will be relieved of problems and disputes for a long time. The union means that her fetus comes with many good things for her. The astronomy is safety and closeness to God Almighty, because our master Noah was safe In his orbit, and God knows best. Joy in a dream. Seeing grilled fish. Shrimp in a dream. Lentils in a dream. Seeing raw fish. Suicide in a dream. Vomiting in a dream. Feces in a dream. A date in a dream. The snake in a dream. A person you love several

title: Interpretation of a vision of childbirth for a married or unmarried woman

preview.html: Interpretation of childbirth for a married woman who is not pregnant. A married woman sees that she is giving birth in a dream and she was having a difficult birth. In fact, she is not pregnant as it appears that there are many problems with her husband and they can be solved with understanding. A married woman dreams of giving birth to a child while she is not pregnant. In fact, she has shown it to be a prediction for her husband at work. Perhaps The vision indicates the presence of problems with children. The meaning of a dream about a strange child being born in a dreamWhen a married, non-pregnant woman dreams that she has given birth to a strange living being, this indicates that she has entered a new era in her life in which she is not satisfied with herself. The difficulty of giving birth to a barren married woman. A barren married woman who suffers from childlessness When she sees in her dream that she is giving birth, and the birth was difficult and not easy, this is a sign of that. Pregnancy very soon, God willing. Giving birth in a dream for a single woman. Seeing a dead child for a married woman in a dream. A married woman who has given birth before or not, if she dreams that she has given birth to a dead child. Or she died in her womb, indicating infertility and inability to have children. Perhaps the vision shows intense grief over the loss of one of her relatives or her husband in reality due to death. Giving birth in a dream of a working married woman. The work of a married woman when she dreams of giving birth is a good sign of her excellence in her work. It may It indicates that he will find a new job with a higher salary. Or it indicates that she will be promoted at work because of her competence and diligence. The vision indicates that you are hearing happy news. Birth of male twins to a married woman in a dream. When a married woman dreams that she gave birth to twins in a dream, this is evidence of fatigue and evil. It may It indicates that something bad happened to one of her family members. The vision also shows that financial insolvency is a great material for her and her husband. A dream about giving birth to twins for a married woman. See the point. Females giving birth to twins may have happy events, success, ambitions and desires. It also indicates a lot of goodness for her, her husband and her children. Male and female twins for married women. The dream shows marital happiness for the dreamer But there are those who hate her and want to marry her and engage in foreign practices. Please add the dream that you would like to interpret by referring to the family situation in a comment below the article, and we will respond to it and interpret it.

title: The 7 most important interpretations of seeing birds in a dream

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing a bird in a dream? An indication of the many problems this girl faces. What does it mean to see a bird on the hand of a married woman? This means that something unpleasant will happen soon. What is the interpretation of seeing birds in a cage? This means that someone close to her will die. Meaning Seeing the sound of a bird? It means the good things people say about it. What is the interpretation of seeing a bird for a girl? The sign of a good girl. Interpretation of seeing birds in one dreamSeeing a bird in a dream is a sign of many problems that this girl faces. The bird shows a lot of money that He has, but he spends it in a different area. The interpretation of killing a bird means that he will marry a shaky man who has no personality. Commentators said that slaughtering a bird for a virgin means that she will give birth to a child and that she will be very afraid of him. The interpretation of seeing a bird for a girl is a sign of a loving girl. It indicates activity And vitality in work. Hearing the voice of the bird means the kind words that people say about it. Interpretation of a dream about a bird in the hand means that she will marry a generous man who has a lot of money. Eating bird meat or the money she gets or getting married. Interpretation of a dream about a bird in a cage means that one Her relatives will die. A dream about birds for a married woman. Interpretation of seeing birds in a dream for a married woman leads to serious quarrels with her husband, but they will end. Then seeing a bird falling from the sky on a married woman means the return of the absent person. Eating birds means a happy and stable life. Then to see a bird flying, it means The job and the prestigious job that you will get. Interpretation of a dream about a bird in the hand of a married woman means that something unpleasant will happen soon. Interpretation of a dream about birds for a pregnant woman. The bird means a male for a pregnant woman. Then seeing a female bird is a sign of the birth of a girl. Eating a bird means that her birth is easy and that her child In good health. Dreaming of colorful birds. Commentators said: If the bird is white, this indicates that this lady is pure and has a lot of morals. Especially if she is married, the white color on the birds also indicates a happy independent life. As for the black color, it is not good for them because it indicates a lot of Of the problems that the woman will face, but these problems and disputes will end, but only after taking a certain period of time. After that, the interpretation of seeing black birds for young men means anxiety and sadness. Ibn Sirin said: If the girl is unmarried, the yellow bird is a sign of denial and that those around her are jealous of the blessings that she receives. In it, as well as the black bird for an unmarried woman, it means that she is doing bad deeds that anger God Almighty. While many colored birds are food, the virgin girl is a sign of marriage. Interpretation of a dream about birds for a man: The bird means a generous person who is loved by people, and birds mean money and prestige. It is considered Seeing birds among people is a sign of many enemies who do not like you. Birds also mean money that men get without messing around. Seeing the sound of birds means a good life that will bring him closer to his wife and family. Slaughtering a bird is a sign of achieving prosperity.

Seeing the sound of birds means a good life that will bring him closer to his wife and family. Slaughtering a bird is a sign of achieving prosperity.

title: Interpretation of seeing a slaughtered bird in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a slaughtered bird in a dream Birds are one of the meats that people love, and God Almighty mentioned them in His book, “And the meat of birds is what they desire.” Seeing them in a dream means wealth and high positions. Interpretation of seeing a slaughtered bird in a dream Whether the vision is for a single, married, pregnant or divorced woman, we will present it today through the vision site, which we will discuss Interpretation of seeing a slaughtered bird in a dream in detail in a dream, based on the opinion of great interpreters such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Katheer, Al-Nabulsi, Imam Al-Sadiq or modern interpreters, follow us on the vision site. Interpretation of seeing a bird slaughtered in a dream by Ibn Sirin Seeing a bird in a dream announces a man in his strength, weapon and height in the air. Seeing a falcon in a dream indicates strength and prestige and is said to indicate an unjust sultan. Whoever has an eagle in a dream indicates the fulfillment of desires, possessing leadership and power, and fulfilling desire. Interpretation of seeing a bird slaughtered for a man in a dream If a man sees a colorful bird and his wife is pregnant, this may indicate the birth of a boy. If a man sees that a bird picks up a leaf worm and is sick in his house, it may mean that he is sick The death of a patient from his family or family. Seeing birds in a dream indicates wealth and wealth And the increasing profit is the strength of religion and the glorification of the rituals of God. Interpretation of seeing birds slaughtered for an unmarried woman in a dream If the girl sees that she is talking to birds, this indicates a distinguished position and magnificence. Seeing a bird's nest in a girl's dream It shows that you will get a great job. If you see bird feathers in a girl's dream It indicates prosperity and a large amount of money earned. Interpretation of seeing a slaughtered bird for a married woman in a dream If a married woman sees birds in her dream, it indicates honor, kindness and prosperity in her life. Seeing white birds in a married woman's dream It indicates purity of the chest, religiosity, and many good deeds, and it is undesirable to see black birds and may indicate evil and bad behavior. Interpretation of seeing a slaughtered bird in a dream for a pregnant woman Seeing birds in a pregnant woman's dream It indicates hearing good news and facilitating childbirth. Seeing a pregnant bird in a dream It indicates the birth of a newborn child, and if a bird is seen, this indicates the birth of a female. Interpretation of seeing birds slaughtered for a divorced and widowed woman in a dream If a divorced or widowed woman sees birds flying over her head, it indicates that she heard good news, such as taking up a prestigious job Distinctive or legacy Seeing eating birds in a dream of a divorced and widowed woman indicates wealth and fortune and reaching a leadership position Seeing flocks of birds in a dream Seeing flocks of birds flying in the sky It indicates good luck and a lot of money from work or an investment project. Seeing flocks of birds in a dream of a man and a woman announces inheritance. Interpretation of dreams Birds in the sky Watching birds flying in the sky It indicates having a leadership position and achieving fame. Watching birds of prey eating It indicates the fulfillment of desires and victory over enemies. Interpretation of a dream of a black bird Seeing black birds in a dream of a man or a woman may not

title: Interpretation of eating and buying cheese in a dream

preview.html: The interpretation of eating and buying cheese in a dream is one of the dreams and visions in which searches increase on a daily basis, and this title appears in search results on the famous Google search engine, due to the frequent searches for this dream by many people throughout the day, and we often hear some people say that The interpretation of cheese in a dream is praiseworthy. In general, others also say that seeing cheese in a dream is an unpleasant and unpleasant dream, so we will provide you with all the different and diverse interpretations that explain seeing cheese in a dream. In fact, the vision is interpreted based on different factors. The first factor is the gender of the person who is dreaming, whether male or female. This factor varies greatly in interpretation. The second factor is the dreamer's social status. The interpretation varies according to the marital status. If the dreamer is married, single, pregnant, or widowed, and other cases in which the interpretation of the dream differs, and through our website today we want to present everything that revolves around this topic, so follow us. Interpretation of eating and buying cheese in a dream in the following paragraph. We will provide you with the different general interpretations of seeing eating and buying cheese in a dream in detail and what it indicates: It is said that if the cheese is white, this indicates many tasks accomplished in a short time and completed to perfection. Likewise, seeing cheese in a dream may indicate The arrival of a new job and starting its work for the first time, which will bring a lot of goodness and happiness to the observer. But if you see moldy, inedible cheese and you do not eat it, this indicates that you have not completed some things that are not beneficial to you. Follow the interpretation of eating and buying cheese in a dream. This vision could be Also a warning to whoever sees it, that he is negligent in his work and does not master the work of conscience. As for seeing cheese in a dream, but with meat, it indicates the death of someone who is a competitor or enemy of the monarch. Eating cheese in a dream may indicate an increase in the fortuneteller’s livelihood if he eats cheese with dates. The interpretation of cottage cheese in a dream is good peeling, as it indicates abundant nutrition, happiness, and peace of mind acquired by the dreamer. Interpretation of eating and buying cheese in a dream for a single girlAfter we discussed in the previous paragraph some of the different and diverse interpretations given by leading scholars for seeing cheese in general, we will present to you the interpretations The different general meaning of seeing cheese for a single girl: Seeing cheese in a dream for a single girl is a good and praiseworthy vision, as it clearly shows that this girl is on the verge of a period of living comfortably and happily. But if she sees that she is eating cheese, this is clear and clear evidence that this gesture will get married soon. From a person with high morals and high standards. Seeing eating cheese in a dream for a single girl can indicate the fulfillment of her dreams and achieving everything she aspires to. But if an unmarried girl sees that she is buying cheese, this indicates that she will spend a lot of money, because she will buy expensive things. The price. Interpretation of eating and buying cheese in a dream for a married man. In the previous paragraph, we talked with you about the interpretation

title: Interpretation of a dream about debts in a dream

preview.html: The interpretation of seeing debts in a dream has different expressions, some of which are positive, many of which are negative and unpleasant. For example, seeing debts in a dream indicates that the viewer is in strong need of help. There are some interpretations of this dream according to Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi, but the site is not responsible for refusing to interpret any vision. We will mention it in any other vision of opinion, because this is forbidden, as it is necessary to search for an interpreter in the dream who has a legitimate dream that interprets the dream. Interpretation of seeing debts in a dream according to Al-NabulsiImam Al-Nabulsi says that the interpretation of seeing debts in a dream can be one of the indications of a great reward from the person. God - the Almighty - and the arrival of goodness and happiness to the dreamer - God willing -. If the opinion in the dream sees that he wants to pay off debts, this indicates that this person is trying to get closer to God - the Almighty and the Great. As for the dream of the dead person’s debts, it is one of the indications of the dreamer’s desire to Paying charity - God willing - seeing debts in a single woman’s dream. A single girl who sees in a dream that she is in debt, this indicates that there is a lot of money falling on that girl’s shoulders and she wants to pay it off, and God knows best. As for an unmarried girl who sees in a dream that she is asking One of her famous characters is paying off a debt, as this indicates the girl’s exposure to darkness and her desire to regain her rights. Also, paying off debts in an unmarried girl’s dream could be an indication that she will marry - God willing - someone who has morals and religion. Seeing debts in a married woman’s dreamMarried woman If a woman sees debts in a dream, this may indicate that the woman has no rights over her husband, and God knows best. As for seeing a married woman in a dream asking her husband to help her pay off her debts, this means that there are many disagreements between the married woman and her husband, and God knows best. Seeing a married woman in debt in a dream can indicate many problems that a woman suffers from. Seeing a man paying off a debt in a dreamA man who sees in a dream that he is paying off debts in a dream while he is married indicates that this indicates the happiness and stability that this man enjoys and getting rid of Of the worries and problems that he suffers from. As for the unmarried person who sees that he is paying a debt to others in a dream, then he is a person recovering from illness or returning to God - Glory be to Him - this is a vision from people - God willing - of marrying a beautiful girl soon. If a son dreams By paying the father’s debts, this indicates piety and justice in religion, and this dream may indicate good offspring. Different meanings of seeing debt in a dream. Seeing debts paid in a dream means alleviating the problems and crises that the dreamer is suffering from. The man who pays the debt, this is humanity in a profitable trade. Or happiness. As for paying the debts of a character that the dreamer does not know, this may indicate a response to complaints and good qualities that the dreamer possesses, and God knows best.
